summary: "Blue's Clues" is an American kids' TV show that aired from 1996 to 2006 on Nickelodeon. It features an animated blue dog, Blue, who leaves clues for the host and viewers to solve. The show was created to help young children learn through interactive storytelling, using bright colors and simple shapes. It was very popular, becoming the top-rated show for preschoolers in the U.S. and winning many awards. The format was even turned into a live tour and a spin-off series. A new version, "Blue's Clues & You!", started in 2019.
title: Blue's Clues
